CustomField.formula:
IF( Contract__r.MNID_Assets__c > 0,
IF( ISBLANK(Contract__r.Remit_To_Address__c), '', Contract__r.Remit_To_Address__c & BR()) & IF( ISBLANK(Contract__r.Remit_To_City__c), '', Contract__r.Remit_To_City__c & ", ")& IF( ISBLANK(Contract__r.Remit_To_State__c), '', Contract__r.Remit_To_State__c & ", ")& IF( ISBLANK(Contract__r.Remit_To_Zip_Code__c ), '', Contract__r.Remit_To_Zip_Code__c ),
IF( INCLUDES ( Contract__r.Program__c , 'XBS' ), 'Xerox Financial Services' & BR() &
'PO Box 7' & BR() &
'Mount Laurel, NJ 08054',
'MARLIN LEASING CORPORATION DBA PEAC SOLUTIONS' & BR() &
'PO Box 37' & BR() &
'Mt. Laurel, NJ 08054' & BR() & 'ATTN: Vendor Servicing' & BR() & '1-844-792-2879' & BR() & 'dealerRepurchases@peacsolutions.com')
)
CustomField.label: PEAC Solutions PO box
